short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Clears the Downloads list every 30 seconds when all downloads are complete.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
An extremely small utility extension that will auto-clear your download bar every 30 seconds when the downloads are complete.

Note: No screenshot as attached, as its an background activity.
